name: DriverLicenseException
title: Driver License Exception
description: Driver License Exception codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Fleet: no principal operator (e.g.: genuine fleet)
concept.definition: A fleet of vehicles without a designated primary driver, typically in commercial fleet operations where multiple drivers share vehicles.

designation.value: Flotte, sans conducteur principal (flotte réelle)
Flota: sin operador principal (p. ej.: flota genuina)

concept.display: Company or corporation -no principal operator (eg. synthetic fleet)
concept.definition: A company or corporation that owns vehicles without a designated principal operator, creating a synthetic fleet arrangement where no single driver is primarily responsible.

designation.value: Compagnie ou société - aucun conducteur principal (ex. flotte artificielle)
Empresa o corporación - sin operador principal (p. ej. flota sintética)

concept.definition: Driver information is currently unavailable as the license details are being actively investigated or searched for.

designation.value: Inconnu : sous enquête
Desconocido: en búsqueda

concept.display: No driver operating the insured vehicle
concept.definition: A situation where the insured vehicle was not being operated by any driver at the time of the incident, such as a parked vehicle or theft scenario.

designation.value: Aucun conducteur conduit le véhicule assuré
Ningún conductor operando el vehículo asegurado

concept.display: Unidentified driver: fled the scene of the accident
concept.definition: The driver involved in the incident left the scene before being identified, making it impossible to obtain license information.

designation.value: Conducteur non identifié : a fui les lieux de l'accident
Conductor no identificado: huyó de la escena del accidente

concept.definition: The driver does not possess a valid driver's license.

designation.value: Conducteur sans permis
Conductor sin licencia

concept.definition: An incident where no other party or driver was involved, such as single-vehicle accidents.

designation.value: Aucun tiers impliqué
Ningún tercero involucrado

concept.display: Unsuccessful search for the driver's license number
concept.definition: Attempts to locate the driver's license number have been made but were unsuccessful.

designation.value: Recherche infructueuse du numéro de permis du conducteur
Búsqueda infructuosa del número de licencia del conductor

concept.display: Varied: element not defined as an automobile(e.g.: pedestrian)
concept.definition: An incident involving an element that is not classified as an automobile, such as a pedestrian, bicycle, or other non-motorized entity.

designation.value: Varié : élément non défini comme automobile (par ex. piéton)
Variado: elemento no definido como automóvil (p. ej.: peatón)

concept.definition: The driver declined or refused to provide their driver's license information when requested.

designation.value: A refusé de fournir le permis
Se negó a proporcionar licencia

concept.definition: The driver's license is currently suspended and not valid for operation of a vehicle.

designation.value: Permis suspendu
Licencia suspendida

concept.definition: The driver's license has passed its expiration date and is no longer valid.

designation.value: Permis expiré
Licencia vencida
